title.value: Непрерывное профессиональное образование персонала в корпоративных структурах агропромышленного комплекса Республики Беларусь
Continuing professional education of the staff in the corporate structures of agro-industrial complex of the Republic of Belarus
Continuing professional education of the staff in the corporate structures of agro-industrial complex of the Republic of Belarus

journal.title: Agropanorama : scientific and technical journal for the agro-industrial complex workers

person.name: Yakushev, I.I., Belarus State Agrarian Technical Univ., Minsk (Belarus)

abstract.value: Topical issues of continuous education of managers and professionals in corporate structures of agro-industrial complex are stated in the article. Continuous education is a development of a person as individuality throughout his/her course of life. It is obvious that self-education of the personality acts as reserve of a continuity of education. Continuous education of managers, professionals in corporate structures of agrarian and industrial complex will allow increasing the effectiveness of the system of human resource management in branches of agro-industrial complex.
